Package com.game.myGame

Class AudioEffects

java.lang.Object
com.game.myGame.AudioEffects
public class AudioEffects
extends java.lang.Object
This class is meant to build an AudioEffects manager that will load the sounds effects for the game. It also gives some methods for playing them and to modify the volume.
Author:
MatteoValerio

  • Method Details

    • init

      private void init()

    • startSound

      public void startSound​(java.lang.String id)
      This public method plays a sound given the id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the sound

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume​(float volume, java.lang.String id)
      This method modifies the volume of the sound, given the id
      Parameters:
      volume - The new volume level. It must be a value between 0 and 1.
      id - The id of the sound to modify
